content:
Is the "Mathlib Manual: Tactics" page been moved? I used to be able to access it here: https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib-manual/html-multi/Tactics/#tactics

It is still linked at that address here: https://leanprover-community.github.io/documentation.html
(The title reminds of #mathlib4 > Mathlib: the Missing Manuals :sweat_smile:)
Also #general > Tactics are now available in the API docs might be the answer, aka https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/tactics.html
Ah, beautiful. Thank you @Anne Baanen for making the documentation better!

Coincidentally I was fixing tracking down and fixing other dead links and got around to the doc overview page today! Fix for the broken link: https://github.com/leanprover-community/leanprover-community.github.io/pull/786
